name: Terra Hyphea
description:
Thunder struck you down and damaged your wing.. 

You find yourself in the middle of the forest surrounding with slimes and spiders. Gather, Craft and fight your way out of the forest.

Aria! that is who you are, a pixie from the Fairy Kingdom. No bigger than an ant you have to survive, repair your wing and find your way back home!

DOWNLOAD READ:

This game had not quit or pause functionality. so you have to Alt+F4 to close the game. Also you still encounter some bugs.
